data.eml:eml: Additions to the knowledge of the Mutillidae (Hymenoptera) of Pakistan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lelej, Arkady S., Ullah, Mishkat, Mahmood, Khalid (2007): Additions to the knowledge of the Mutillidae (Hymenoptera) of Pakistan. Zootaxa 1444: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176099
